attributes.action: Remove French From Schools Or make it Optional.
attributes.additional_details: Make languages a optional Lesson and GCSE in all High Schools. Make mandarin the new language, becuase Chinese is the way of the future and business.
attributes.background: French is one of the most unimportant subject in school, I'm not gonna lie the only people who speak French Is French people and 80% know how to speak English. But know you have to do it for a GCSE is a waste of my time. Considering I know and probably many other kids we won't use it.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what languages to teach are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament, so it is up to individual schools whether to offer French of Mandarin lessons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to make learning a modern language in school optional, if that's what you want to happen.
